english.segment1: Look what hes done to you. It isnt fair. Your light was bright and new. But he didnt care. He took the heart of a little girl. And made it grow up too fast
english.segment2: Now words like innocence. Dont mean a thing. You hear the music play. But you cant sing. Those pictures in your mind. Keep you locked up inside your past
english.segment3: This is a song for the broken girl. The one pushed aside by the cold, cold world. You are. Hear me when I say. Youre not the worthless they made you feel. There is a Love they can never steal away. And you dont have to stay the broken girl
english.segment4: Those damaged goods you see. In your reflection. Love sees them differently. Love sees perfection. A beautiful display. Of healing on the way tonight. Tonight
